original_title: Mexico’s bat man on saving the ‘most unfairly treated animals on Earth’ | CNN
article_summary: "Over 1,400 bat species worldwide exhibit diverse features, but many are endangered. Highlights include the Florida bonneted bat, Honduran white bat with yellow skin pigments, and Jamaican flower bat roosting in hot caves. Conservationists aim to increase awareness of these unique creatures' ecological roles."</s>
